description: Maps role categories to base resume templates. The JD analyzer classifies each job, and the orchestrator picks the best template.

swe.name: Software Engineer
swe.description: Technical engineering roles focused on coding and system design

notes: If a template file doesn't exist, falls back to default
Priority is used for tie-breaking when multiple categories match
Keywords are matched case-insensitively against job title
